K10D0276_H0278:114b-1: du; a'arya buddha kshe pa na n'a ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10D0276_H0278:114b-3: 'phags pa sangs rgyas mi spang pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10D0276_H0278:114b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0276_H0278:114b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0276_H0278:114b-7: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi
K10D0276_H0278:114b-8: phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyi sa brgya
K10D0276_H0278:114b-9: lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang
K10D0276_H0278:114b-10: / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
K10D0276_H0278:114b-11: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K10D0276_H0278:114b-12: mya ngan med kyis byin pa 'khor de nyid du
K10D0276_H0278:114b-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan
K10D0276_H0278:114b-15: gyi mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa dang
K10D0276_H0278:114b-16: / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi 'od dang /
K10D0276_H0278:114b-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshangs pa
K10D0276_H0278:114b-18: las byung ba 'brug dbyangs sprin gyi nga ro dang
K10D0276_H0278:114b-19: / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon
K10D0276_H0278:114b-20: tan rin po che'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i
K10D0276_H0278:114b-22: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i
K10D0276_H0278:114b-23: yon tan las byung ba 'brug gi nga ros 'gro
K10D0276_H0278:114b-24: ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
K10D0276_H0278:114b-25: po 'od kyi gzi brjid rnam par bsgrags pa grags
K10D0276_H0278:114b-26: ba dang / pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0276_H0278:115b-0: sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi @115b bkod pa
K10D0276_H0278:115b-1: mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa la sems pa dang /
K10D0276_H0278:115b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan
K10D0276_H0278:115b-3: rin po che mtha' yas pa'i me tog kun tu
K10D0276_H0278:115b-4: rgyas pa'i rnam par bsgrags pa grags pa dang /
K10D0276_H0278:115b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
K10D0276_H0278:115b-6: kyi snang bas spobs pa bstan pa'i blo gros dang
K10D0276_H0278:115b-7: / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bcu
K10D0276_H0278:115b-8: po de dag 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur
K10D0276_H0278:115b-9: / te 'khod do // de dag ni gzungs thob
K10D0276_H0278:115b-10: par bya ba'i phyir lo bdun du brtson par gyur
K10D0276_H0278:115b-11: / te 'khod do // pa dag go / de
K10D0276_H0278:115b-12: dag ni lo bdun 'das nas sems mnyam par bzhag
K10D0276_H0278:115b-13: pa'ang ma thob na gang gzungs thob par 'gyur ba
K10D0276_H0278:115b-14: / te 'khod do // pa dag go / lta
K10D0276_H0278:115b-15: ci smos / de dag ni lo bdun du rmugs
K10D0276_H0278:115b-16: / te 'khod do // pa dag go / lta
K10D0276_H0278:115b-17: ci smos / pa dang / gnyid yongs su spangs
K10D0276_H0278:115b-20: 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su spang ba
K10D0276_H0278:115b-21: la brtson par byas kyang bsam pa bzhin ma thob
K10D0276_H0278:115b-22: cing gzungs ma thob nas yongs su skyo ba'i yid
K10D0276_H0278:115b-23: kyis bslab pa phul nas nyams par gyur la /
K10D0276_H0278:115b-24: thams cad kyang khyim na gnas pa'i skyon khas blangs
K10D0276_H0278:115b-25: shing bstan pa 'di las phyir dong ba sha stag
K10D0276_H0278:115b-26: go / yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes sgra
K10D0276_H0278:115b-27: 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go
K10D0276_H0278:115b-28: go / / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i 'gyod pa bsal to //
K10D0276_H0278:115b-29: 'gyod pa bsal ba des kyang zhag bdun du sbyin
K10D0276_H0278:115b-30: pa byin zhing bcings pa thams cad kyang rab tu
K10D0276_H0278:116a-0: de sbyin pa byin te zhag @116a *//
K10D0276_H0278:116a-1: bdun po de dag 'das nas srog chags bye ba
K10D0276_H0278:116a-2: phrag bdun dang lhan cig tu chos mnyan pa'i phyir
K10D0276_H0278:116a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du lhags so //
K10D0276_H0278:116a-4: rigs kyi bu bcu po khyim na gnas pa'i skyon
K10D0276_H0278:116a-5: khas blangs pa bstan pa 'di las phyir dong ba
K10D0276_H0278:116a-6: de dag kyang 'khor de nyid du lhags so //
K10D0276_H0278:116a-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K10D0276_H0278:116a-8: bag tsha ba med par gnas pa zhes bya ba
K10D0276_H0278:116a-10: bskal pa grangs med par rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa /
K10D0276_H0278:116a-11: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa /
K10D0276_H0278:116a-12: spobs pa sna tshogs pa; ye shes kyi sgo dang /
K10D0276_H0278:116a-13: chos kyi sgo thams cad sgrub pa la mkhas pa /
K10D0276_H0278:116a-14: chos bshad pa'i phyir sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang /
K10D0276_H0278:116a-16: mos pa la mkhas pa zhig kyang 'khor de nyid du 'ongs so //
K10D0276_H0278:116a-17: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K10D0276_H0278:116a-18: bag tsha ba med par gnas pa stan las langs
K10D0276_H0278:116a-19: te / chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas
K10D0276_H0278:116a-20: bus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te
K10D0276_H0278:116a-21: te / / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K10D0276_H0278:116a-22: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K10D0276_H0278:116a-23: rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni dgung lo
K10D0276_H0278:116a-24: bdun du gzungs kyi don la brtson par gyur na
K10D0276_H0278:116a-25: de dag bsam pa ma grub cing bstan pa 'di
K10D0276_H0278:116b-0: las slar mchis @116b pa khyim na gnas par g-yar
K10D0276_H0278:116b-2: de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu
K10D0276_H0278:116b-3: de dag la ci nas myur ba kho nar ye
K10D0276_H0278:116b-4: shes thob par 'gyur ba de ltar legs par lung
K10D0276_H0278:116b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0276_H0278:116b-7: sems dpa' chen po bag tsha ba med par gnas
K10D0276_H0278:116b-8: pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0276_H0278:116b-10: 'di ltar de dag gis sangs rgyas mi spang ba
K10D0276_H0278:116b-11: zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos
K10D0276_H0278:116b-12: la / sangs rgyas spong ba ni rjes su thob ste /
K10D0276_H0278:116b-13: des na rigs kyi bu de dag myur du shes pa 'di la ma skyes so //
K10D0276_H0278:116b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0276_H0278:116b-15: sems dpa' chen po bag tsha ba med par gnas
K10D0276_H0278:116b-16: pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis zhus so
K10D0276_H0278:116b-17: // chos kyi rgyal po 'od mdzad pa //
K10D0276_H0278:116b-18: mi yi nyi ma khyod la zhu //
K10D0276_H0278:116b-19: byang chub sems dpa'i las spyod pa //
K10D0276_H0278:116b-20: spyod pa gang lags de bstan gsol //
K10D0276_H0278:116b-21: dpag med khyad par 'phags pa'i blo grags pa; ;sangs rgyas thogs med stobs bcu mtshungs ma mchis //
K10D0276_H0278:116b-22: srid gsum 'byung ba rnam grol spros mi mnga'//
K10D0276_H0278:116b-23: sangs rgyas byang chub spyod pa dri med gsungs //
K10D0276_H0278:116b-24: dpag med ye shes mnga' ba khyod la zhu //
K10D0276_H0278:116b-25: yid gnyis gcod par mdzad pa khyod la zhu //
K10D0276_H0278:116b-26: bcom ldan mtshungs pa mi mnga' khyod la zhu //
K10D0276_H0278:116b-27: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul gang lags //
K10D0276_H0278:117a-1: ba bdud thul bde gshegs gang gis na //
K10D0276_H0278:117a-2: nyon mongs kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur //
K10D0276_H0278:117a-3: thugs rjes nyon mongs thul la byang chub lam //
K10D0276_H0278:117a-4: 'phags pa de ni rab tu bshad du gsol //
K10D0276_H0278:117a-5: legs gsal legs byung legs 'brel gsung ba po //
K10D0276_H0278:117a-6: srid sel srid 'gro rnam 'joms lhur mdzad pa //
K10D0276_H0278:117a-7: dge sbyong bzang po smra mchog yid gnyis sel; ;rgyal ba bde gshegs dri med spyod kun gsungs //
K10D0276_H0278:117a-8: sngon gyi srid brgyar legs spyad yon tan dge /
K10D0276_H0278:117a-9: 'gro ba phan bder bsngo la brtson pa po //
K10D0276_H0278:117a-10: rin chen glang po rta spangs yun kyang ring //
K10D0276_H0278:117a-11: bud med tshogs dang bu yang spangs mdzad pa //
K10D0276_H0278:117a-12: bzod dang dul dgyes tshul khrims yon tan gzhol //
K10D0276_H0278:117a-13: blo gros dgyes gzhol brtul zhugs dka' thub brtsams //
K10D0276_H0278:117a-14: yon tan tshol bas sdug bsngal brgya bzod pa //
K10D0276_H0278:117a-15: rgyal ba khyod kyis de brnyes yid gnyis bral //
K10D0276_H0278:117a-16: spyod lam mkhas pa yid gnyis rnam spangs pa //
K10D0276_H0278:117a-17: skyon tshogs dri ma gsum gyi tha ba bral; ;'gro ba thams cad du yang rab gshegs pa //
K10D0276_H0278:117a-18: mgon po byang chub mchog gi tshul bshad gsol //
K10D0276_H0278:117a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0276_H0278:117a-20: sems dpa' chen po bag tsha ba med par gnas
K10D0276_H0278:117a-21: pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0276_H0278:117a-23: byang chub sems dpa' bcu po 'di dag thams cad kyis ni sangs rgyas mi spang ba byas so //
K10D0276_H0278:117b-2: sangs rgyas mi spang ba zhes bgyi ba de gang lags /
K10D0276_H0278:117b-5: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa sum
K10D0276_H0278:117b-6: cu 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten
K10D0276_H0278:117b-7: gyi khams smig rgyu can du de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0276_H0278:117b-8: rnam par gzigs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba byung
K10D0276_H0278:117b-9: bar gyur pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de
K10D0276_H0278:117b-10: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyi ma'i dus
K10D0276_H0278:117b-11: phyi ma'i tshe na rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di
K10D0276_H0278:117b-12: dag khyim bdag shing s'a la chen po lta bu'i
K10D0276_H0278:117b-14: de'i tshe rigs kyi bu bcu po de dag thams
K10D0276_H0278:117b-15: cad kyis gtsug lag khang lnga brgya byed du bcug
K10D0276_H0278:117b-16: go / gtsug lag khang re rer yang dge slong stong stong gnas par gyur to //
K10D0276_H0278:117b-18: de'i tshe chos smra ba spobs pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba gzungs thob pa zhig chos ston to //
K10D0276_H0278:117b-20: chos smra ba spobs pa brtsegs pa de chos kyi
K10D0276_H0278:117b-21: stan la 'dug pa la sangs rgyas lnga stong spobs
K10D0276_H0278:117b-23: lha dung phyur phrag brgyad kyang lus yongs su spyad pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to //
K10D0276_H0278:117b-24: de'i chos bshad pa gcig gis srog chags bdun khri
K10D0276_H0278:117b-25: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K10D0276_H0278:117b-26: chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur to //
K10D0276_H0278:117b-27: srog chags khri ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo //
K10D0276_H0278:117b-29: de'i tshe rgyal po zla bas byin pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo //
K10D0276_H0278:118a-0: des chos la gus pas chos smra ba de la mchod pa'i phyir @118a *//
K10D0276_H0278:118a-4: dge slong de la rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis kyang mngon par gtor te /
K10D0276_H0278:118a-5: tsandan gyi byug pas kyang byugs so //
K10D0276_H0278:118a-6: ras bcos bu lnga brgyas kyang bkab bo //
K10D0276_H0278:118a-7: bde ba'i rim gro thams cad kyis mchod pa /
K10D0276_H0278:118a-9: chos smra ba la mchod pa'i mchod pa mchog gis zhag bdun du rim gro byas so //
K10D0276_H0278:118a-10: de nas dge slong de la khyim bdag gi bu
K10D0276_H0278:118a-11: de dag gis 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyis glengs so
K10D0276_H0278:118a-12: // las de'i rnam par smin pas de dag lo
K10D0276_H0278:118a-13: dgu khrir sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes so
K10D0276_H0278:118a-14: // // tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni mi rnams kyi nang du za ma dang /
K10D0276_H0278:118a-16: log par lta ba'i khyim rnams su skyes so //
K10D0276_H0278:118a-17: tshe rabs drug brgyar ni dmus long dang; lce med par gyur to //
K10D0276_H0278:118a-18: tshe rabs bdun brgyar ni rab tu byung nas ji
K10D0276_H0278:118a-19: srid 'tsho'i mthar thug gi bar du gzungs ma thob
K10D0276_H0278:118a-21: las kyi sgrib pa de nyid kyis rigs kyi bu de dag bsgribs so //
K10D0276_H0278:118a-23: de lta bas na khyod mos par bya'o //
K10D0276_H0278:118a-24: khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o //
K10D0276_H0278:118a-25: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas chos smra ba
K10D0276_H0278:118a-26: la mngon sum du mthong yang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims
K10D0276_H0278:118a-27: kyis brjod par mi bya na thos pas lta ci
K10D0276_H0278:118a-29: gang zhig sems can thams cad kyi mig 'byin par
K10D0276_H0278:118b-0: byed pa bas @118b ni gang zhig chos smra ba
K10D0276_H0278:118b-1: la gshe ba'i bsam pas lta bar byed na /
K10D0276_H0278:118b-2: de ni de bas ches kha na ma tho ba'i las che ba yin no //
K10D0276_H0278:118b-3: gang zhig sems can thams cad 'ching bar byed la /
K10D0276_H0278:118b-4: gang zhig chos smra ba mthong na rgyab kyis phyegs te 'dug par byed na /
K10D0276_H0278:118b-5: bsod nams ma yin pa 'di la bsod nams ma
K10D0276_H0278:118b-6: yin pa snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar
K10D0276_H0278:118b-15: gang chos smra ba la skur pa 'debs pa des
K10D0276_H0278:118b-16: ni sangs rgyas la skur pa btab par 'gyur ba'i
K10D0276_H0278:118b-17: phyir ro // sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod pas chos smra ba la bsnyen bkur bya'o //
K10D0276_H0278:118b-18: sangs rgyas la mchod par 'dod pas chos smra ba la mchod par bya'o //
K10D0276_H0278:118b-19: sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal bar 'dod pas chos smra ba la phyag bya'o //
K10D0276_H0278:118b-21: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba'i phyir dang /
K10D0276_H0278:118b-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba'i phyir ro //
K10D0276_H0278:118b-23: gang las brten te byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub
K10D0276_H0278:118b-24: tu sems skyes pa de las brten nas de ni
K10D0276_H0278:118b-25: nyon mongs pa rnams kyi 'dod pa'i longs spyod la
K10D0276_H0278:118b-26: gnas par brjod par mi bya /
K10D0276_H0278:118b-27: de ni nam du'ang tshangs par spyod pa la mi gnas par brjod par mi bya /
K10D0276_H0278:119a-0: de ni gzugs med pa'i ting nge @119a *//
K10D0276_H0278:119a-1: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyang gzugs med par nye bar 'gro bar brjod par mi bya'o //
K10D0276_H0278:119a-3: byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis mi skye ste /
K10D0276_H0278:119a-4: byang chub sems dpa' ni smon lam gyi dbang gis skye ba'i phyir ro //
K10D0276_H0278:119a-5: de ni byis pa'i spyod pa thams cad las grol ba'o //
K10D0276_H0278:119a-6: gang byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa rnams ston
K10D0276_H0278:119a-7: par 'dod pa des ni nam mkha'i khams kyi gzugs
K10D0276_H0278:119a-12: klu thams cad klu nyid du spyir song ba yin
K10D0276_H0278:119a-13: pas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa ni klu'i bgrang
K10D0276_H0278:119a-14: bar yang 'gro la klu'i nyes pa gsum gyis kyang
K10D0276_H0278:119a-17: mgo la bye tshan mi 'bab pa dang /
K10D0276_H0278:119a-18: skyob po'i lus dang lhan cig tu kun tu mi gnas pa dang /
K10D0276_H0278:119a-19: de la nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ba ste /
K10D0276_H0278:119a-21: klu'i skyon gsum po de dag gis gos par mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0276_H0278:119a-23: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsed mo dang /
K10D0276_H0278:119a-24: dga' ba thams cad nyams su myong bar byed kyang
K10D0276_H0278:119a-25: srid pa gsum du 'dod pa dang; nyon mongs pa
K10D0276_H0278:119a-26: dang / sdug bsngal rnams kyis zil gyis mi non par brjod par bya'o //
K10D0276_H0278:119b-0: sems can gyi ris nya pa zhes bya ba yod @119b do; ;de ni chu la spyod /
K10D0276_H0278:119b-1: chu la blta'ang der 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0276_H0278:119b-3: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
K10D0276_H0278:119b-4: po 'khor ba na spyod kyang de nyid du byis
K10D0276_H0278:119b-5: pa'i spyod pa la gnas nas ye shes kyi spyod
K10D0276_H0278:119b-6: pa tshol lo // chos yang dag par blangs pas kyang rmongs par mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0276_H0278:119b-7: byis pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pas srid pa
K10D0276_H0278:119b-8: gsum gyi sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar yang mi
K10D0276_H0278:119b-9: 'gyur ro // de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag bsrung bar bya'o //
K10D0276_H0278:119b-10: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K10D0276_H0278:119b-11: bde bar gshegs pa gang zhig mchod bya dang //
K10D0276_H0278:119b-12: de la gang zhig phyag kyang 'tshal 'dod pa //
K10D0276_H0278:119b-13: des 'dir bde gshegs sras rnams mchod par bya //
K10D0276_H0278:119b-14: 'di ni rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa mchog /
K10D0276_H0278:119b-15: nga yi gos dang lhung gzed gding ba dang //
K10D0276_H0278:119b-16: mal cha dang ni 'chags gang yin pa //
K10D0276_H0278:119b-17: gang dag byang chub don du brtson byed pa //
K10D0276_H0278:119b-18: de dag la ni nga yis gnang ba yin //
K10D0276_H0278:119b-19: 'di ltar mi mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyang //
K10D0276_H0278:119b-20: de las nges par shin tu byung ba'i phyir //
K10D0276_H0278:119b-21: sangs rgyas rnams la ji ltar mchod bya ba //
K10D0276_H0278:119b-22: de bzhin de dag la yang mchod par bya //
K10D0276_H0278:119b-23: de dang de dag mgon dang mkhas pa ste //
K10D0276_H0278:119b-24: long ba rnams la mig kyang sbyin par byed //
K10D0276_H0278:119b-25: lam la rmongs pa rnams kyi ston pa ste //
K10D0276_H0278:120a-2: gal te sems can rnams kyis de dag la //
K10D0276_H0278:120a-3: rtag tu dga' bas longs spyod kun byin yang //
K10D0276_H0278:120a-4: de dag rnams kyi dang po'i sems brten pa //
K10D0276_H0278:120a-5: de la'ang lan glan byas par mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0276_H0278:120a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0276_H0278:120a-7: sems dpa' chen po bag tsha ba med par gnas
K10D0276_H0278:120a-10: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi las kyi sgrib
K10D0276_H0278:120a-11: pa de gang gis rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i
K10D0276_H0278:120a-12: rnam grangs 'ga' zhig mchis lags sam /
K10D0276_H0278:120a-15: bag tsha ba med par gnas pa /
K10D0276_H0278:120a-16: gal te rig kyi bu de dag rab tu byung
K10D0276_H0278:120a-17: nas gzungs sngags kyi gzhi dag zlos par byed na'o
K10D0276_H0278:120a-42: rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bzlas la /
K10D0276_H0278:120a-43: zhag bdun du 'dzin pa med pa dang /
K10D0276_H0278:120a-46: rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /
K10D0276_H0278:120a-47: rab tu dang ba med pa dang /
K10D0276_H0278:120a-48: yun ring du 'gro ba med pa dang /
K10D0276_H0278:120a-50: gos pa med pa dang; mnyam pa'i sems dang bral ba dang /
K10D0276_H0278:120a-51: phung po lnga dang bral ba dang /
K10D0276_H0278:120a-52: mi bzod pa med pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas rjes
K10D0276_H0278:120a-53: su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya dgos
K10D0276_H0278:120b-0: te / de ni de dag phyogs bcu'i sangs @120b rgyas stong gi zhal mthong bar byed pa dang /
K10D0276_H0278:120b-1: nyes pa 'chags su 'jug par byed pa'o //
K10D0276_H0278:120b-2: de nas rigs kyi bu de dag gis rab tu byung ste /
K10D0276_H0278:120b-3: gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bzlas nas zhag bdun du brtson par 'dzin pa med pa dang /
K10D0276_H0278:120b-5: rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /
K10D0276_H0278:120b-6: rab tu dang ba med pa dang /
K10D0276_H0278:120b-7: yun ring du 'gro ba med pa dang /
K10D0276_H0278:120b-10: mnyam pa'i sems dang bral ba dang /
K10D0276_H0278:120b-11: phung po lnga dang bral ba dang /
K10D0276_H0278:120b-12: mi bzod pa med pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas rjes
K10D0276_H0278:120b-13: su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya dgos
K10D0276_H0278:120b-14: te de dag ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas stong gi
K10D0276_H0278:120b-15: zhal mthong bar byed pa dang /
K10D0276_H0278:120b-16: nyes pa 'chags su 'jug par byed pa'o //
K10D0276_H0278:120b-17: de nas rigs kyi bu de dag gis rab tu
K10D0276_H0278:120b-18: byung ste gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bzlas nas
K10D0276_H0278:120b-19: zhag bdun du brtson par 'dzin pa med pa la
K10D0276_H0278:120b-20: sogs pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge
K10D0276_H0278:120b-21: 'dzin bsgoms te / sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ngo //
K10D0276_H0278:120b-22: las kyi sgrib pa de'ang bshags so //
K10D0276_H0278:120b-23: de nyid kyi tshe thams cad sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang thob bo //
K10D0276_H0278:120b-24: 'khor ba las bskal pa sum cu'ang phyir bsnyil lo //
K10D0276_H0278:120b-25: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K10D0276_H0278:120b-26: bag tsha ba med par gnas pa /
K10D0276_H0278:120b-27: de la gang rgyal po zla bas byin zhes bya
K10D0276_H0278:120b-28: ba gang gis chos smra ba de la mchod pa
K10D0276_H0278:120b-29: byas par gyur pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0276_H0278:120b-30: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
K10D0276_H0278:120b-31: tshe dpag tu med pa yin te /
K10D0276_H0278:120b-32: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po zla bas byin par gyur to //
K10D0276_H0278:121a-1: spobs pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba chos smra ba
K10D0276_H0278:121a-2: byung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
K10D0276_H0278:121a-3: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs
K10D0276_H0278:121a-4: pa yin te / de'i tshe de'i dus na chos
K10D0276_H0278:121a-5: smra ba spobs pa brtsegs pa zhes bya bar gyur
K10D0276_H0278:121a-6: pa yin te / to // gang dag khyim pa
K10D0276_H0278:121a-7: shing s'a la chen po lta bu'i gzhon nur gyur
K10D0276_H0278:121a-8: pa bcu po de dag ni rigs kyi bu 'di
K10D0276_H0278:121a-9: pa yin te / to // dag yin te /
K10D0276_H0278:121a-10: de'i tshe de'i dus na gang dag gis chos smra
K10D0276_H0278:121a-11: ba spobs pa brtsegs pa de la 'chal pa'i tshul
K10D0276_H0278:121a-13: khyim bdag shing s'a la chen po lta bu'i gzhon nu bcu por gyur to //
K10D0276_H0278:121a-15: de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar gnas pas gnas kyang rung ste /
K10D0276_H0278:121a-16: byang chub sems dpas srog gi phyir yang 'khrul pa la lta bar mi bya'o //
K10D0276_H0278:121a-19: chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0276_H0278:121a-20: rnams kyi byang chub yongs su spyod par byed pa'i
K10D0276_H0278:121a-21: phyir ro // bzhi gang zhe na /
K10D0276_H0278:121a-22: stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /
K10D0276_H0278:121a-23: sems can thams cad la zhe 'dras pa med pa'i sems dang /
K10D0276_H0278:121a-24: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rtag tu phan pa nye bar sgrub pa dang /
K10D0276_H0278:121a-25: zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos sbyin pa yang dag par bstan pa ste /
K10D0276_H0278:121a-27: chos bzhi po de dag ni /
K10D0276_H0278:121a-28: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byang chub yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'o //
K10D0276_H0278:121a-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bka' stsal to //
K10D0276_H0278:121a-30: rgyal bas gang gis de dag rnam dag pa //
K10D0276_H0278:121b-0: stong la mos pa lam gyi @121b dang por gsungs //
K10D0276_H0278:121b-1: de la rtag tu bag yod gang gnas pa //
K10D0276_H0278:121b-2: de ni sangs rgyas thob nas 'jig rten snang //
K10D0276_H0278:121b-3: sems can kun la rtag tu dang ba dang //
K10D0276_H0278:121b-4: gang la'ang kva zhes brjod par mi 'dod cing //
K10D0276_H0278:121b-5: nga rgyal spangs nas skye bo rnams la bzod //
K10D0276_H0278:121b-6: 'di ni sbyong bar byed pa'i lam gnyis pa'o //
K10D0276_H0278:121b-7: sdug pa'i dngos po dri med gang ci'ang rung //
K10D0276_H0278:121b-8: byang chub mchog brtson rnams la de sbyin zhing //
K10D0276_H0278:121b-9: de dag las ni lan 'dod mi bya ste //
K10D0276_H0278:121b-10: byang chub rab mchog gi ni lam gsum pa'o //
K10D0276_H0278:121b-11: snying rje can gyis nges par skye bo la //
K10D0276_H0278:121b-12: zang zing med par rtag tu chos spyan zhing; ;lhag pa'i bsam pa yis ni snying brtse ba //
K10D0276_H0278:121b-13: de bzhin mkhas pas spyod pa'i lam bzhi pa'o //
K10D0276_H0278:121b-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs la
K10D0276_H0278:121b-17: sbyor bar byas pas ni dgon pa la bstan par
K10D0276_H0278:121b-18: bya / chos nyan du 'gro bar bya /
K10D0276_H0278:121b-19: gos gtsang ma dag bcang bar bya /
K10D0276_H0278:121b-21: spyod lam bzhis gnas par bya //
K10D0276_H0278:121b-22: chos smra ba rnams la sna tshogs sbyin pa bsgrub pa'i bsam pa la sbyor ba dang /
K10D0276_H0278:121b-24: dkon mchog gsum la gus pa dang bcas par bya /
K10D0276_H0278:121b-25: gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur bar bya /
K10D0276_H0278:121b-26: yongs su mi skyo ba dang /
K10D0276_H0278:121b-27: rtag tu brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /
K10D0276_H0278:121b-29: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang ma bral ba dang /
K10D0276_H0278:122a-2: ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed par bya /
K10D0276_H0278:122a-3: sangs rgyas la gsol ba gdab par mos par bya /
K10D0276_H0278:122a-5: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
K10D0276_H0278:122a-6: yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas par bya /
K10D0276_H0278:122a-7: ma brtags pa'i spyod lam du mi bya /
K10D0276_H0278:122a-10: bla ma la gnas bca' bas gnas par bya'o //
K10D0276_H0278:122a-12: chos de dag la yongs su mi skyo bas bsten par bya'o //
K10D0276_H0278:122a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad
K10D0276_H0278:122a-14: pa na srog chags sku mkhri ni sngon sems ma
K10D0276_H0278:122a-15: bskyed pa las byang chub tu sems skyes so //
K10D0276_H0278:122a-16: srog chags lnga stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi
K10D0276_H0278:122a-17: mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam
K10D0276_H0278:122a-18: par dag go / byang chub sems dpa' sum khri
K10D0276_H0278:122a-19: ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so
K10D0276_H0278:122a-20: par dag go / // chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
K10D0276_H0278:122a-21: thos pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
K10D0276_H0278:122a-23: gang gis bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed
K10D0276_H0278:122a-24: du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
K10D0276_H0278:122a-25: khams rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang nas dkon
K10D0276_H0278:122a-26: mchog gsum la sbyin pa byin par byed la gang
K10D0276_H0278:122a-27: zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par byed na
K10D0276_H0278:122a-28: / de ni de dag las mchog tu bkrabs pa'o //
K10D0276_H0278:122a-29: gang zhig bskal pa stong du shes rab kyi pha
K10D0276_H0278:122a-30: rol tu phyin pa ma gtogs par pha rol tu
K10D0276_H0278:122b-0: phyin pa lnga la @122b spyod par byed la /
K10D0276_H0278:122b-1: gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par byed
K10D0276_H0278:122b-2: na 'di ni de dag las mchog tu bkrabs pa'o
K10D0276_H0278:122b-3: // gang zhig sangs rgyas stong la snga dro dang /
K10D0276_H0278:122b-5: phye ma red kyi dus su bsnyen bkur byed /
K10D0276_H0278:122b-9: gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par byed na /
K10D0276_H0278:122b-10: 'di ni de dag las mchog tu bkrabs pa'o //
K10D0276_H0278:122b-12: de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba dang /
K10D0276_H0278:122b-16: yi ger bri bar bya ba'i phyir khyed cag la gtad kyi /
K10D0276_H0278:122b-18: srog yongs su gtang ba dang /
K10D0276_H0278:122b-19: yang bsngo zhing yongs su bsrung bar bya'o //
K10D0276_H0278:122b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10D0276_H0278:122b-21: byang chub sems dpa' bag tsha ba med par gnas pa dang /
K10D0276_H0278:122b-22: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K10D0276_H0278:122b-24: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
K10D0276_H0278:122b-28: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K10D0276_H0278:122b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10D0276_H0278:122b-30: 'phags pa sangs rgyas mi spang ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10D0276_H0278:122b-31: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang /
K10D0276_H0278:122b-33: zhus chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sde
